record.properties: FontSize = 8 Alignment = 2 Caption = "Fecha" Name = "Header1"

FontSize = 8 BorderStyle = 0 Margin = 0 ForeColor = 0,0,0 BackColor = 255,255,255 Name = "Text1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE KeyPress LPARAMETERS nKeyCode, nShiftAltCtrl
If nKeycode = 13
Sele tempg cFolio ='' cFolio = padl(allt(Tempg.Numdoc),10)
DoForm('Requi1',2,recno(), cFolio)
ENDIF ENDPROC

record.methods:
PROCEDURE KeyPress LPARAMETERS nKeyCode, nShiftAltCtrl
WITH THISFORM
* If nKeycode = -2 * * *Tomar variables * Sele Tempg * nRec = Recno() * cNumprov = Padl(Allt(Tempg.Numcli),5) * * *Traer la ventana * Doform('Saldos',cNumcli) * * GO nRec * * ENDIF
ENDWITH
ENDPROC

PROCEDURE Click
*Clik autorizacion
WITH THISFORM
If This.value = .T.
Sele Tempg Replace ClavAut with Allt(Numuser)
Else
Sele Tempg Replace ClavAut With ''
Endif
.Grid1.Refresh()
ENDWITH ENDPROC

Top = 28 Left = 876 Height = 32 Width = 82 FontSize = 8 Caption = "Consultar" ZOrderSet = 3 Name = "Command2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *Boton consultar WITH THISFORM
nOpcion = .Opciones.value
DO CASE
CASE nOpcion = 1 .ConsDepto()
CASE nOpcion = 2 .Conscomp()
CASE nOpcion = 3 .Consultar()
ENDCASE
ENDWITH ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 92 Left = 787 Height = 15 Width = 58 FontSize = 8 Caption = "Compras" TabIndex = 14 ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "Command1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *Autorizar Requi WITH THISFORM
cNumUser = Numuser
Sele Tempg Scan
*If Tempg.Autoriza == .T. And Tempg.Yamodi == .F.
Sele Tempg cTiponum = 'RQ' + Tempg.Numdoc
Sele Docum =Seek(cTiponum,'Docum','Tiponum') If found() Sele Docum Replace Autoriza with Tempg.Autoriza,; ClavAut with iiF(Tempg.Autoriza = .T.,iiF(Not Empty(Tempg.ClavAut),Tempg.ClavAut,Padl(Allt(cNumuser),5)),"") Endif
*Endif
Endscan
Aviso('Se han Autorizado los documentos')
nOpcion = .Opciones.value
DO CASE
CASE nOpcion = 1 .ConsDepto()
CASE nOpcion = 2 .Conscomp()
CASE nOpcion = 3 .Consultar()
ENDCASE
ENDWITH ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 21 Left = 60 Width = 96 Height = 24 TabIndex = 1 ZOrderSet = 5 Name = "Leefecha1" Container1.Name = "Container1" Fecha.Name = "Fecha" Buscar.Name = "Buscar"
Top = 28 Left = 976 Height = 23 Width = 23 Picture = r:\sait\cia008\excel.bmp Caption = "" TabIndex = 8 ZOrderSet = 6 Name = "Excel"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
If not opendbf ('cia') Return .F. Endif
Sele Tempg
With Thisform * Mada a Excel la consulta cNomcia = Allt(Cia.NOMCIA) cTitulo = .Caption cColumnas = '' cMascaras = '' OpenExcel(cNomCia,cTitulo,cColumnas,cMascaras)
EndWith
Sele cia use
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 92 Left = 894 Height = 16 Width = 60 FontSize = 8 Caption = "Finanzas" TabIndex = 14 ZOrderSet = 14 Name = "Command3"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click *Autorizar Requi WITH THISFORM
cNumUser = Numuser
Sele Tempg Scan
*If Tempg.Autoriza2 == .T. And Tempg.Yamodi2 == .F.
Sele Tempg cTiponum = 'RQ' + Tempg.Numdoc
Sele Docum =Seek(cTiponum,'Docum','Tiponum') If found() Sele Docum Replace Autoriza2 with Tempg.Autoriza2,; ClavAut2 with iiF(Tempg.Autoriza2 = .T.,iiF(Not Empty(Tempg.ClavAut2),Tempg.ClavAut2,Padl(Allt(cNumuser),5)),"") Endif
*Endif
Endscan
Aviso('Se han Autorizado los documentos')
nOpcion = .Opciones.value
DO CASE
CASE nOpcion = 1 .ConsDepto()
CASE nOpcion = 2 .Conscomp()
CASE nOpcion = 3 .Consultar()
ENDCASE
ENDWITH ENDPROC
